entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %

Dewpoint: -9.3°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 30 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
